GET /accounts/{account_id}/dex/colos.description: List Cloudflare colos that account's devices were connected to during a time period, sorted by usage starting from the most used colo. Colos without traffic are also returned and sorted alphabetically.

parameters.description: unique identifier linked to an account in the API request path.
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: Start time for connection period in RFC3339 (ISO 8601) format.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: End time for connection period in RFC3339 (ISO 8601) format.
parameters.name: to

parameters.description: Type of usage that colos should be sorted by. If unspecified, returns all Cloudflare colos sorted alphabetically.
parameters.name: sortBy

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

success.description: Whether the API call was successful
